text:
*[Bug 15027] max.print is ignored for matrix  *and* other array headers*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=15027>

Heather Turner (<mailto:ht@heatherturner.net|ht@heatherturner.net>) changed:

           What    |Removed                     |Added
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
                 CC|                            |ht@heatherturner.net

--- Comment #12 from Heather Turner (<mailto:ht@heatherturner.net|ht@heatherturner.net>) ---
Regarding the message produced by `print.data.frame()` that Martin mentions in
comment #9, there is some initial analysis of that in this Dev Day issue that
was a spin-off from early analysis of this bug:
<https://github.com/r-devel/r-dev-day/issues/3>.

That discussion may help anyone that is following Martin's suggestion to work
on the message at the same time as improving the printed output for data
frames.
